Package src.interfaces

Interface CollectionSiteInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CollectionSite
    public interface CollectionSiteInterface
    Collection Site where Master Thief plans and paintings are stored

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      char appraiseSit​(AssaultPartyInterface[] assaultPartyInterfaces)
      Called by Master Thief to appraise situation: either to take a rest, prepare assault party or sum up results
      void collectACanvas()
      Called by Master Thief to collect all available canvas - Synchronization point between Master Thief and each individual Ordinary Thief with a canvas
      int getNextAssaultPartyID()
      Get the number of the next Assault Party and remove it from the queue
      int getPaintings()
      Getter for the number of paintings acquired
      void handACanvas​(int party)
      Called by the Ordinary Thief to hand a canvas to the Master Thief if they have any - Synchronization point between each busy-handed Ordinary Thief and the Master Thief
      void startOperations()
      Called by Master Thief to initiate operations
      void takeARest()
      Master Thief waits while there are still Assault Parties in operation

        char appraiseSit​(AssaultPartyInterface[] assaultPartyInterfaces)
        Called by Master Thief to appraise situation: either to take a rest, prepare assault party or sum up results
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        next situation
